item.title: Two LCD VGA monitors that work with my Amiga 500
item.description: I recently purchased a Nec Multisync 1970VX VGA monitor for use on my older RGB computers (Atari ST/STE/Amiga/CoCo 3/800XL with VBXE). It works well with the Amiga. Unfortunately, I can't get it to show up with my Mega STe. I haven't tried it with any of â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
